data.name: TextColumns
desc: provides access to columns in text (e.g., in TextFrames ).

properties.name: AutomaticDistance
desc: contains the distance between the columns.

It is valid if the property IsAutomatic is set. Half of this distance is set to the left and right margins of all columns, except for the left margin of the first column, and the right margin of the last column.

properties.name: IsAutomatic
desc: determines whether the columns all have equal width.
This flag is set if XTextColumns.setColumnCount() is called and it is reset if XTextColumns.setColumns() is called.

properties.name: SeparatorLineColor
desc: determines the color of the separator lines between the columns.

properties.name: SeparatorLineIsOn
desc: determines whether separator lines are on.

properties.name: SeparatorLineRelativeHeight
desc: determines the relative height of the separator lines between the columns.

properties.name: SeparatorLineStyle
desc: determines the style of the separator lines between the columns.

properties.name: SeparatorLineVerticalAlignment
desc: determines the vertical alignment of the separator lines between the columns.

properties.name: SeparatorLineWidth
desc: determines the width of the separator lines between the columns.
